short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Showing the latest BTC/USD/EUR/GBP/TRY/KRW/JPY/VND price for SXP

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension shows the current SXP price in the desired currency. The default currency is BTC.

Users can click on the icon to access all currency options or hover to show the price in more detail.

Currently supported currencies: BTC, USD, EUR, GBP, TRY, KRW, JPY and VND

To illustrate price changes, the background color of the amount will change depending on the price direction. It will appear green if the price rises and red if it falls. Data is pulled from the CoinGecko API every 30 seconds.

If you would like me to add another currency or have any other suggestions, please let me know. All feedback is welcome, including bug reports. ðŸ˜Š
